data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: ""Laughter is the best medicine" is a common saying. Explain what this expression means and why you agree or disagree. Give specific reasons for your answer."
data.answer: I agree that laughter is the best medicine because it can trigger healthy physical and emotional changes in the body. Nothing works faster or more dependably to bring your mind and body back into balance than a good laugh. Cheerfulness lightens people's burdens, inspires hope, connects people to others, and keeps people grounded, focused, and alert. It also helps people release anger and forgive sooner. With so much power to heal and renew, the ability to laugh easily and frequently is a tremendous resource for surmounting problems, enhancing people's relationships, and supporting both physical and emotional health. Best of all, this priceless medicine is fun, free, and easy to use. （110 字）
